import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import Loading from '../utils/loading/Loading' const initialState={ product_id : '', title : '', price : 0, description : "WorldRef ecommer Web app", content : 'Reactjs Framescript', category: '' } function CreateProduct() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [product,setProduct] = useState(initialState) const [categories] = state.categoriesAPI.categories const [images ,setImages] = useState(false) const [loading , setLoading] = useState(false) const styleUpload={ display: images ? "block" : "none" } const handleUpload=async e=>{ e.preventDefault() try { } catch (error) { alert(error.response.data.msg) } } return (
